summary.span: 与批处理请求相关联的 HTTP 响应中的标头。

span.span: The headers from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.

value.span: 包含 HTTP 响应的名称值对的 对象。

span.span: An object containing the name-value pairs of an HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当因为没有一组表示整个保存操作的标头而未使用批处理时，所返回 实例上的标头属性将为空集合。The headers property on the instance returned will be an empty collection when batching is not used because there is no set of headers that represents the entire save operation.

summary.span: 与批处理请求相关联的 HTTP 响应中的状态代码。

span.span: The status code from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.

value.span: 基于 [超文本传输协议](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119520)中定义的状态代码的整数。

span.span: An integer based on status codes defined in [Hypertext Transfer Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119520).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于批处理操作，这将是与整个批处理相关联的 HTTP 响应中的状态代码。For batching operations, this is the status code from the HTTP response associated with the entire batch. 对于非批处理请求，该值始终为 200，这意味着调用方必须检查每个操作，以确定其结果。For non-batching requests, the value is always 200, which means the caller must inspect each operation to determine its result.
